title: There's someone making a lot of money by giving me motion sickness.....
review: The movie itself was fairly refreshing. There were no hooded creeps with hooks-for-hands trying to kill big-breasted highschool girls....However....The method of filming made me feel ill. It really did.  About 6 people left during the relatively short film to go yak up their popcorn, simply because it was hard to watch.  I know, I know...that's how it's supposed to be, but crud, who needs to have a headache just from watching a movie?
